hints.content:
Manny has $48$ cups of lemonade and she sells $22$ cups of lemonade.

![](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/4a4d18dea9dd0c8ed7cc9d8c4024a4a53f227b79)

$\purpleD{48}-\blueE{22}=\maroonD{26}$

Manny has $\maroonD{26}$ cups of lemonade left after her lunch sale.

Then, Manny sold $\tealE{14}$ cups of lemonade at dinner time.

![](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/0e228046a057f809cb6be068553e75f622a963a3)

$\maroonD{26}-\tealE{14}=\goldE{12}$
Manny has $\goldE{12}$ cups of lemonade left after lunch and dinner.

question.content:
Manny is selling lemonade.  She has prepared $48$ cups of lemonade.   At lunch time, she sells $22$ cups of lemonade.  At dinner time, Manny sells $14$ cups of lemonade.    

**How many cups of lemonade does Manny have left?**  

[[â˜ƒ numeric-input 1]] cups
